SELECT v.id id, v.Jobcode jobcode, v.ProjectName projectName, v.contractType contractType, v.VendorName vendorName, v.vendorContractVersion vendorContractVersion, v.VendorContractCode vendorContractCode, date_format(v.VendorContractStarttime,'%Y/%m/%d') vendorContractStarttime, date_format(v.VendorContractEndtime,'%Y/%m/%d') vendorContractEndtime, date_format(v.VenderContracgtSigningDate,'%Y/%m/%d') venderContracgtSigningDate, v.VendorContractStatus vendorContractStatus, v.ContractValue contractValue, workitem.id AS workItemId, instance.id AS instanceId FROM i_vendorcontract v /*LEFT JOIN i_contracttype c ON v.contractType = c.id LEFT JOIN i_client_contract_version ccv ON v.vendorContractVersion = ccv.id*/ LEFT JOIN biz_workflow_instance instance ON v.id = instance.bizObjectId LEFT JOIN biz_workitem workitem ON instance.id = workitem.instanceId WHERE
v.jobcode = #{queryVendorContract.jobcode} and
v.VendorContractStatus = #{queryVendorContract.vendorContractStatus} and
v.VendorContractStarttime >= STR_TO_DATE(#{queryVendorContract.starttimeStart},'%Y/%m/%d') and
v.VendorContractStarttime <= STR_TO_DATE(#{queryVendorContract.starttimeEnd},'%Y/%m/%d') and
v.ContractValue >= #{queryVendorContract.contractValue1} and
v.ContractValue <= #{queryVendorContract.contractValue2} and
1=1
